cause.description:
Knowing what I do from personal experience, and from my own kids' experiences, fathers need to stand up and do what is right for their kids. Raise them and spend time with them, not pawn them off like they were trash. They were man enough to make them, can they be man enough to take care of them too?
1. Kids need fathers...period.
cause.mission: Ridding the world of dead beat dads.
cause.name: Fathers acting like Fathers
